title: Through the Downs of Life with You - Novel Updates
tags: Abusive Characters   Charming Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Late Romance   Manipulative Characters   Marriage   R*pe
author: Zhi Nan   知南
description: In order to pay off the debts, I willingly took her place to lie under him, but he unexpectedly used his hand ... I had thought that it was an infatuation that would come to nothing, but I actually fell for it after being thrown off guard by his tenderness. He had a heart of stone, and the thinnest emotion in the world … and it was only until the end that I realized even if I spared no effort and loved him till I breath my last, he would never be mine...>
